title: Grant Morrison's Batman (2006-2013)
description:
Here, collected in its entirety for the first time, is Grant Morrison's sprawling Batman saga. Connections to the post-Crisis, pre-New 52 universe end here. All issues have been retitled and numbered in reading order (or at least the closest I could come to it).

WHAT'S INCLUDED: Every Batman comic from 2006 to 2013 written by Morrison, including The Return of Bruce Wayne and relevant pages from 52, DC Universe 0, and Final Crisis

WHAT'S NOT INCLUDED: Chris Burnham's Batman Incorporated vol. 2 #11, tie-in comics from other series for Resurrection of Ra's al Ghul, Batman: R.I.P., Final Crisis, and Battle for the Cowl



DC made a mess of this run with their original screwy release scheduling, so I've tried to put them all in a reading order that makes sense. Enjoy it.

Thanks to Minutemen, Zone-Empire and DCP, who keep us all reading.
